metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2098 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Action Pack in Ruby on Rails before 3.2.22.2, 4.x before 4.1.14.2, and4.2.x before 4.2.5.2 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary Ruby codeby leveraging an application's unrestricted use of the render method.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2098` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rails - 2:4.2.5.2-1
ruby-actionmailer - 2:4.2.5.2-1
ruby-actionpack - 2:4.2.5.2-1
ruby-actionview - 2:4.2.5.2-1
ruby-activemodel - 2:4.2.5.2-1
ruby-activerecord - 2:4.2.5.2-1
ruby-activesupport - 2:4.2.5.2-1
ruby-rails - 2:4.2.5.2-1
ruby-railties - 2:4.2.5.2-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: rails package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:4.2.5.2-1').
